card.html: <iframe width="200" height="113" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/wkO0ZzLgAgc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="" title="the mindbenders    " a groovy kind of love "     stereo mix 2022....."></iframe>
card.title: the mindbenders    " a groovy kind of love "     stereo mix 2022.....

_source.content: https://youtu.be/wkO0ZzLgAgc After the number1 hit "Game Of Love", Wayne Fontana began plotting a solo career. Fontana picked the time to go solo when he walked off stage during a concert, leaving his band, The Mindbenders, bewildered. Eric Stewart took over singing lead for the remainder of the concert to cheering fans. Fontana's solo career flopped, while The Mindbenders had hit records, which included this million-seller that peaked at number 2 on Billboard in May 1966. Eric Stewart went on to become lead singer of the 1970s group, 10cc, who had the hits "I'm Not In Love" and "Things We Do For Love".
_source.contentraw: https://youtu.be/wkO0ZzLgAgc After the number1 hit "Game Of Love", Wayne Fontana began plotting a solo career. Fontana picked the time to go solo when he walked off stage during a concert, leaving his band, The Mindbenders, bewildered. Eric Stewart took over singing lead for the remainder of the concert to cheering fans. Fontana's solo career flopped, while The Mindbenders had hit records, which included this million-seller that peaked at number 2 on Billboard in May 1966. Eric Stewart went on to become lead singer of the 1970s group, 10cc, who had the hits "I'm Not In Love" and "Things We Do For Love".

card.title: The Lost Art of Structure Packing

_source.content: The Lost Art of Structure Packing (Eric S. Raymond)http://www.catb.org/esr/structure-packing/"This page is about a technique for reducing the memory footprint of programs in compiled languages with C-like structures - manually repacking these declarations for reduced size. It is good to know in any application where you really, really care about optimizing your use of memory bandwidth and minimizing cache-line misses.The first thing to understand is that, on modern processors, the way your compiler lays out basic datatypes in memory is constrained in order to make memory accesses faster. Self-alignment makes access faster because it facilitates generating single-instruction fetches and puts of the typed data. Without alignment constraints, on the other hand, the code might end up having to do two or more accesses spanning machine-word boundaries."
_source.contentraw:
The Lost Art of Structure Packing (Eric S. Raymond)
http://www.catb.org/esr/structure-packing/

"This page is about a technique for reducing the memory footprint of programs in compiled languages with C-like structures - manually repacking these declarations for reduced size. It is good to know in any application where you really, really care about optimizing your use of memory bandwidth and minimizing cache-line misses.

The first thing to understand is that, on modern processors, the way your compiler lays out basic datatypes in memory is constrained in order to make memory accesses faster. Self-alignment makes access faster because it facilitates generating single-instruction fetches and puts of the typed data. Without alignment constraints, on the other hand, the code might end up having to do two or more accesses spanning machine-word boundaries."

BREAKING: Josh Shapiro sponsored drag queen event in Philadelphia that gave 'service hours' to minors. ( Pennsylvania )
The Post Millennial ^ | Oct 30, 2022 | Joshua Young
https://thepostmillennial.com/flashback-dem-candidate-for-governor-josh-shapiro-sponsored-event-at-drag-queen-gay-bingo?utm_campaign=64502

The GayBINGO! event featured "campy entertainment" that was guided by the "antics of the drag-queens-on-skates Bingo-Verifying Divas."
‚Ä¶
Josh Shapiro, the Democrat candidate running for governor of Pennsylvania, attended an event called GayBINGO! In November 2009, which featured drag queens skating around and entertaining the crowd, including "children."

A photo posted to social media shows then-State Representative Shapiro guffawing on stage next to one of the drag queens as bingo numbers are read. The caption to the photo reads, "Rep. Shapiro sponsored a game of BINGO for the AIDS Fund Philly's monthly GayBINGO! Event."
‚Ä¶
According to Philadelphia Gay News, the event featured "campy entertainment" that was guided by "antics of the drag-queens-on-skates Bingo-Verifying Divas."

The event had children in attendance according to the outlet, as "Trish Houck and her children, Leah and Eric" were given awards for volunteer efforts as both children started volunteering for GayBINGO! when they started high school. Their mother, Trish, had heard about GayBINGO! from a PBS Documentary on the event.

An archived record of the event exists on the Internet Archive.

Shapiro's opponent, Republican candidate Doug Mastriano, has criticized Shapiro, who is currently the state's attorney general, for his support of radical gender ideology.

Speaking with Real America's Voice host David Brody on October 20, Mastriano specifically called Shapiro out for failing to speak out against the experimentation on foster children being conducted by doctors associated with Children's Hospital of Philadelphia.

The Human Rights Campaign, an activist group known for its strong support of the medical transition of children, endorsed Josh Shapiro for governor of Pennsylvania in early October, just months after it awarded the Children's Hospital of Philadelphia an award for excellence in LGBTQ+ healthcare.

Josh Shapiro also advocated to allow students to use the bathroom that they claim aligns with their gender identity, not their biological sex, while he served as the state‚Äôs attorney general.

_source.contentraw:
Sad that that's what it takes for some of the incompetant, sold out scumbags to pull their collective heads out of their asses... üò°
-
France is ‚Äòchanging gear‚Äô on migrant issues ‚Äì minister
After the murder of a 12-year-old girl, the French government says it seeks a new immigration bill that will be ‚Äúhardline‚Äù

France will introduce tough immigration legislation next year, making it easier to deport foreign criminals, Interior Minister Gerald Darmanin told Le Monde on Wednesday. Under pressure from the right, Paris is ‚Äúchanging gear,‚Äù Darmanin said.

The bill will be debated in parliament in early 2023. While its specific provisions remain to be hammered out, the minister said that it will allow the police and courts to punish criminal aliens more effectively, while making it easier for legal immigrants to obtain work permits to shore up the country‚Äôs labor demand.

One of its measures, Darmanin explained, will strip away three-quarters of the existing grounds for illegal immigrants to appeal deportation orders. The government will also remove access to social services for those set to be deported, remove rules barring long-term residents from deportation, and force the local authorities to act on expulsion orders.

According to Le Monde, France issued 122,000 expulsion orders in 2021 but only enforced 3,200 in the last two years. Although foreigners make up 7% of the French population, they are responsible for 19% of crimes, according to figures cited by both Darmanin and French President Emmanuel Macron. In Paris, foreigners are responsible for half of all crimes.

While pro-migrant activists say that many of these crimes are trivial, the latest push to tighten up immigration law comes after the body of a 12-year-old girl was found in a suitcase in Paris with her throat cut last month. The suspect, charged with raping and murdering the schoolgirl, is an Algerian woman who had been issued a deportation order two months previously.

With right-wing politician Eric Zemmour describing the murder as ‚ÄúFrancocide‚Äù and National Rally leader Marine Le Pen demanding that the government stop ‚Äúout-of-control illegal immigration,‚Äù Darmanin said that by tackling the problem, he would seek to deny the right ‚Äúpolitical fuel.‚Äù

‚ÄúIt is up to us to enact the strong ‚Äì sometimes even hardline ‚Äì measures that the French want or need, otherwise others will do it for us,‚Äù he added.

Macron has long been pressed by the right to harden his immigration policies, as migrant camps became a familiar sight on Paris streets under his leadership. Macron has failed to live up to his 2019 promise to execute 100% of all deportation orders, but now insists that he will focus on removing ‚Äúthe most dangerous‚Äù criminal foreigners.

https://www.rt.com/news/565821-france-new-immigration-law/

_source.content: People Are Angry ....The voter watched.... Clinton and Gore as they stole all the Letter W's from keyboards and typewriters before they left.Chief Justice Roberts was one of the lawyers who were hammering on the office windows and demanding that the "Recount" be stopped.Bush later named the guy as Chief Justice.Republican's know that scream loudly wins elections.My voice is higher than your voice!Dueling Talking CarlsSnotr2010(YouTube Video)https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t-7mQhSZRgMThe voters watched as Bush promised "Change"President Bush: "Wall Street got drunk"Unaware he was being recorded, President Bush at a Houston fundraiser last week compared Wall Street to a drunk with a hangover and cracked jokes about the ailing housing market."There's no question about it. Wall Street got drunk ‚Äî that's one of the reasons I asked you to turn off the TV cameras ‚Äî it got drunk and now it's got a hangover," Bush said at a private fundraiser for Republican congressional candidate Pete Olson. "The question is: How long will it sober up and not try to do all these fancy financial instruments?"Treasury Secretary Hank Paulson's "Bail-Out Plan" passed by Congress on October 03, 2008.The voters watched as Obama claimed to hear the Ccommon ManObama bailed out the Ecomomic Terrorists on Wall Street with 9 Trillion dollars.  (Bush had called them "Drunkards").Attorney General Eric Holder claimed that the Economic Terrorists on Wall Street are "Too Big To Fail"No criminal fraud charges.And everybody lived happily ever-after.+ The total bonus pool for 182,100 New York City-based Wall Street employees was $31.7 billion ‚Äî enough to pay for more than 1 million jobs paying $15 per hour for a year.--Sara Anderson, March 31, 2021--The voters watched as December 22, 2017:Trump tax cuts totaled $5.5 trillion. The corporate income tax rate shrank to 21 percent from 35 percent, and companies also won a tax break on the trillions in profits brought home from offshore. March 27, 2020In addition, the CARES Act was a massive, $6 trillion giveaway to Wall Street, banks, large corporations, and stockholders.And: We need to raise interest rates because Biden and The Boys gave individual citizens too much free money and which created too much demand and inflation. It was the Rich Folks who got all the free money!56% of Americans can‚Äôt cover a $1,000 emergency expense with savings--Carmen Reinicke, January 19, 2022--They are too broke to bury their dead.Wall Street pay v. the minimum wage+ Since 1985, the average Wall Street bonus has increased 1,217 percent, from $13,970 to $184,000 in 2020. If the minimum wage had increased at that rate, it would be worth $44.12 today, instead of $7.25.Even if everyone agreed that printing another trillion dollars to finance a basic income for the poor would boost neither inflation nor interest rates, the rich and powerful would still oppose it. After all, their most important interest is not to conserve economic potential, but to preserve the power of the few to compel the many.--Yanis Varoufakis, May 17, 2021--
_source.contentraw:
People Are Angry ....

The voter watched....

Clinton and Gore as they stole all the Letter W's from keyboards and typewriters before they left.
Chief Justice Roberts was one of the lawyers who were hammering on the office windows and demanding that the "Recount" be stopped.
Bush later named the guy as Chief Justice.

Republican's know that scream loudly wins elections.

My voice is higher than your voice!
Dueling Talking Carls
Snotr
2010
(YouTube Video)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t-7mQhSZRgM

The voters watched as

Bush promised "Change"

President Bush: "Wall Street got drunk"
Unaware he was being recorded, President Bush at a Houston fundraiser last week compared Wall Street to a drunk with a hangover and cracked jokes about the ailing housing market.
"There's no question about it. Wall Street got drunk ‚Äî that's one of the reasons I asked you to turn off the TV cameras ‚Äî it got drunk and now it's got a hangover," Bush said at a private fundraiser for Republican congressional candidate Pete Olson. "The question is: How long will it sober up and not try to do all these fancy financial instruments?"
Treasury Secretary Hank Paulson's "Bail-Out Plan" passed by Congress on October 03, 2008.

The voters watched as

Obama claimed to hear the Ccommon Man
Obama bailed out the Ecomomic Terrorists on Wall Street with 9 Trillion dollars. (Bush had called them "Drunkards").
Attorney General Eric Holder claimed that the Economic Terrorists on Wall Street are "Too Big To Fail"
No criminal fraud charges.
And everybody lived happily ever-after.

+ The total bonus pool for 182,100 New York City-based Wall Street employees was $31.7 billion ‚Äî enough to pay for more than 1 million jobs paying $15 per hour for a year.
--Sara Anderson, March 31, 2021--

The voters watched as

December 22, 2017:
Trump tax cuts totaled $5.5 trillion. The corporate income tax rate shrank to 21 percent from 35 percent, and companies also won a tax break on the trillions in profits brought home from offshore.

March 27, 2020
In addition, the CARES Act was a massive, $6 trillion giveaway to Wall Street, banks, large corporations, and stockholders.

And:
We need to raise interest rates because Biden and The Boys gave individual citizens too much free money and which created too much demand and inflation.

It was the Rich Folks who got all the free money!

56% of Americans can‚Äôt cover a $1,000 emergency expense with savings
--Carmen Reinicke, January 19, 2022--

They are too broke to bury their dead.

Wall Street pay v. the minimum wage
+ Since 1985, the average Wall Street bonus has increased 1,217 percent, from $13,970 to $184,000 in 2020. If the minimum wage had increased at that rate, it would be worth $44.12 today, instead of $7.25.

Even if everyone agreed that printing another trillion dollars to finance a basic income for the poor would boost neither inflation nor interest rates, the rich and powerful would still oppose it. After all, their most important interest is not to conserve economic potential, but to preserve the power of the few to compel the many.
--Yanis Varoufakis, May 17, 2021--

It highlights what they assert is an open collusion between the government and social media companies.In addition to requesting depositions from health officials like Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases Dr. Anthony Fauci and Surgeon General Vivek Murthy, depositions from cyber officials, including Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) director Jen Easterly, also were made.According to the deposition request, Easterly oversees the ‚Äúnerve center‚Äù of ‚Äúfederally directed censorship‚Äù and views social media speech as a form of ‚Äúinfrastructure,‚Äù which means policing it would fall under the purview of her agency‚Äôs mission to protect infrastructure.During a November 2021 conference, she stated: ‚ÄúOne could argue we‚Äôre in the business of critical infrastructure, and the most critical infrastructure is our cognitive infrastructure, so building that resilience to misinformation and disinformation, I think, is incredibly important.‚ÄùLeaked CISA meeting minutes indicate how the agency has shifted from protecting critical national infrastructure to policing online misinformation.While the focus on combating misinformation began before President Joe Biden was elected with CISA fielding possible forms of disinformation from state election officials before sending them to social media companies for a response, its role has seemingly expanded.In January 2021, CISA replaced the Countering Foreign Influence Task force with the ‚ÄúMisinformation, Disinformation and Malinformation‚Äù team, which was on the lookout for all types of disinformation.Because CISA must adhere to Americans‚Äô right to free speech under the First Amendment, leaked meeting minutes show that Geoff Hale, the director of the Election Security Initiative at CISA, went as far as to recommend the use of third-party information-sharing nonprofits as a ‚Äúclearing house for trust information to avoid the appearance of government propaganda
_source.contentraw:
Social media giants essentially granted government officials the ability to censor and suppress speech in the name of fighting ‚Äúmisinformation,‚Äù by providing them direct access to flag posts and an open line of communication with senior executives, according to a report by The Intercept.

The outlet found that the short-lived Disinformation Governance Board wasn‚Äôt the Biden administration‚Äôs only attempt at censoring political speech and posts that ran contrary to their preferred narratives.

According to leaked records, meeting minutes, and a lawsuit filed by a pair of Republican attorney generals obtained by The Intercept, top-ranking Biden administration officials seemingly worked hand-in-hand with Big Tech to censor content that the federal government deemed misinformation.


A presentation obtained by The Intercept revealed that Facebook went as far as creating a special portal for the Department of Homeland Security and government partners where they could log in to report ‚Äúdisinformation‚Äù directly to the company.

In order to gain access to the back-door portal, a government or law enforcement email was required.

Both DHS and Meta, the parent company of Facebook declined to comment to the outlet when asked why the ‚Äúcontent request system‚Äù at http://facebook.com/xtakedowns/login is still active.

Emails and documents obtained by the outlet detailed just how closely DHS was working with the social media companies.

Emails obtained in a federal lawsuit filed by Missouri Attorney General Eric Schmitt and Louisiana Attorney General Jeff Landry over purported collaboration between the government and social media companies to censor or suppress speech indicate what appears to be coordination between dozens of federal administration officials and social media executives on how to address information regarding COVID-19 and a range of other content.

‚ÄúThe discovery provided so far demonstrates that this Censorship Enterprise is extremely broad,‚Äù Schmitt and Landry said in a joint statement.

DHS did not reply to Newsmax‚Äôs request for comment on the lawsuit.


In a request for depositions of several key administration officials, the attorneys general argue that they were directly involved in social media censorship campaigns, especially stories and posts related to the COVID-19 pandemic. It highlights what they assert is an open collusion between the government and social media companies.

In addition to requesting depositions from health officials like Director of the National Institute of Allergy and Infectious Diseases Dr. Anthony Fauci and Surgeon General Vivek Murthy, depositions from cyber officials, including Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) director Jen Easterly, also were made.

According to the deposition request, Easterly oversees the ‚Äúnerve center‚Äù of ‚Äúfederally directed censorship‚Äù and views social media speech as a form of ‚Äúinfrastructure,‚Äù which means policing it would fall under the purview of her agency‚Äôs mission to protect infrastructure.

During a November 2021 conference, she stated: ‚ÄúOne could argue we‚Äôre in the business of critical infrastructure, and the most critical infrastructure is our cognitive infrastructure, so building that resilience to misinformation and disinformation, I think, is incredibly important.‚Äù

Leaked CISA meeting minutes indicate how the agency has shifted from protecting critical national infrastructure to policing online misinformation.

While the focus on combating misinformation began before President Joe Biden was elected with CISA fielding possible forms of disinformation from state election officials before sending them to social media companies for a response, its role has seemingly expanded.

In January 2021, CISA replaced the Countering Foreign Influence Task force with the ‚ÄúMisinformation, Disinformation and Malinformation‚Äù team, which was on the lookout for all types of disinformation.

Because CISA must adhere to Americans‚Äô right to free speech under the First Amendment, leaked meeting minutes show that Geoff Hale, the director of the Election Security Initiative at CISA, went as far as to recommend the use of third-party information-sharing nonprofits as a ‚Äúclearing house for trust information to avoid the appearance of government propaganda

card.title: Leif Erikson - Wikipedia

_source.content: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Leif_Erikson My great-grandmother had stories of Eric the Red. I was told I Was related to him. Leif was his son. This was decades ago and when she was saying these things, it was a big no-no. My great-grandmother told me Vikings were in the states in the early 90s and 80s. She passed away at nearly 90 in the 90s. This is significant because when she made these claims, it was thought to be bogus information about the Vikings. This was a Mormon woman who grew up in the wild west. She had no business with Viking stories in America or to know of them. This was mostly Mexico when my family got here. This means her family must have come over with the Mormon Caravans. The perfect place to hide for these people. Me and My husband's families were out west during the wild west. This too is rare. We both have Celtic blood. I'm also Italian and English. Hence my passion for art and philosophy.The locations of the Vikings magic forest and their giants settlements put them in only a few locations, New Zealand can be eliminated because the red-haired and blonde ancients didn't arrive until after the fact. Asia has similar mummies, but not boats. The pacific Islander boats pictured here may have been inspired by canoes but appear more Viking. once more showing a connection between Vikings and the states.Viking boats look just like that. The plot thickens. I believe in the bible, but much like the Kennedy assassination took place but was recorded by history incorrectly. This is an aged old tactic that has been in use since before the bible was written. The Vikings may have had ties to an ancient people that knew the truth about something. https://studyfinds.org/vikings-asia-dna-surprising-origins/Now both Native Americans and Asians say they were here first in the west. It should be no surprise that white mummies have been found with blonde and red hair in both regions, Asia and America, and also Africa. I believe these are the original Viking groups. This proves that there were ancient white races that were never European or middle eastern. The dates for these ancient white groups are old, really old. Given how settled they were and known to be more loving than not, they were there in those regions during the floods. And they were spreading out perhaps looking for answers to the floods or population increases.There is heavy Celtic, Native American, and Asian influence in my bloodline. The things I was taught as a child are dangerously close to these ancient beliefs, all the way down to cutting your hair on a full moon. I was taught how to make pottery and bead crafts with the same tiny beads and I have a huge collection of those same beads. I still love making ceramics and want a kiln to make my own. In 2021 I even had a paranormal encounter similar to what Jesus claimed to have. I have always known the cat was my spirit animal. Searching for your ancestors is one of the most important things we can do in this life. If you want to find God you need to find out who you really are first. The Bible is not a farse it's real, but it's the details that are changed around.Just as the things taking place right now are more complicated than left or right, so are the lies in the bible. Oswald was killed as he was claiming to be set up by a deep state after Kennedy's murder. We all know it was not how we were told, did anyone ever think the bible is similar? Has anyone ever looked to see where this type of control came from? Maybe we should be more focused on history than on tabloids. If we expose the raw truth historically we can free ourselves from tyranny, all legal and non-violent. We have to demand these powers that be to open the Vatican catacombs, the Smithsonian, and the 4000 old sealed temples that dot the globe. Let us find out who we really are.If you control the history of who we are you can control the human race. That's just what these organizations do. They tell us who we are but won't let us see because we aren't as close to God as they are...

Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. It‚Äôs totally impossible to ‚Äúearn a gift‚Äù. No ‚ÄúJesus‚Äù in false religions. One doesn‚Äôt HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with The Lord). By contrast, salvation is ‚ÄúJust Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything‚Äù. (‚ÄúThe Gospel ONLY‚Äù, in other words ‚Äì Keyword: ‚ÄúONLY‚Äù). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We‚Äôre under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, He changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren‚Äôt robots. Forever‚Äôs a long time.There are no contradictions in The Word...EVER.
